name: Alex Morgan
bio: Founded Aeris Motorsport in 2023 with a vision to build a competitive and welcoming sim racing community. A versatile driver equally at home in GT3 machinery and open-wheelers, Alex brings strategic thinking and consistent pace to every race.

name: Sarah Chen
bio: Known for her aggressive yet clean racecraft, Sarah has been the team's leading points scorer for two consecutive seasons. Her ability to read tyre wear and adapt strategy mid-race makes her a formidable endurance competitor.

name: James O'Brien
bio: A late-night racer with a knack for last-lap overtakes. James joined Aeris in 2024 and quickly proved himself with a string of podium finishes in the GT3 Sprint Series. Rarely seen without a replay analysis open.

name: Marcus Rivera
bio: The team's data guru. Marcus combines raw speed with meticulous preparation — his pre-race setup work has lifted the whole team's performance. Also serves as the primary strategist during endurance events.

name: Lena Kowalski
bio: The newest addition to the Aeris roster. Lena came through the team's development programme and is rapidly climbing the iRating ladder. Watch this space — she's tipped to be a future championship contender.
